docs.snippet: Capt. M'CLINTOCK'S eagerly expected narrative of the discovery of the fate of Sir JOHN FRANKLIN was published on the 24th ult. The letter placed in Capt. McCLINTOCK'S hands by Lady FRANKLIN, containing the only instructions that he could prevail upon...
docs.lead_paragraph: Capt. M'CLINTOCK'S eagerly expected narrative of the discovery of the fate of Sir JOHN FRANKLIN was published on the 24th ult. The letter placed in Capt. McCLINTOCK'S hands by Lady FRANKLIN, containing the only instructions that he could prevail upon her to give him, will be read with interest:
